content:
As a result of a massive attack of the Russian Federation on Friday morning in the Lviv region, there was a hit by the object of energy infrastructure.

About thisreportedMaxim Kozitsky, chairman of the Lviv Ova.

He noted that during air alarm, the drone of the invaders hit the object of energy infrastructure in the Stryi district.

After the hit, the fire began, now it is extinguished by firefighters. As of this hour, there were no information about the victims.

As reported by the Armyinform, RussiaShe has done12 rocket strokes in Zaporozhye, attacked energy objectsSumy regionand Kharkiv region.
title: In the Lviv region, hostile drone hit the object of energy infrastructure
description: This was reported by the head of the Lviv OVA Maxim Kozytsky. He noted that during ...
author: Army Inform
